code: import styled from'styled-components';import Button from'@distate/components/dist/Button';import{Input}from'@distate/components/dist/Input';import{Select}from'@distate/components/dist/Select';import{TextArea}from'@distate/components/dist/TextArea';import{Autocomplete}from'@distate/components/dist/Autocomplete';export var HTMLButton=styled(Button).withConfig({displayName:"form__HTMLButton",componentId:"sc-1j8rksn-0"})(["padding:3px;"]);export var HTMLButtonTrue=styled(Button).withConfig({displayName:"form__HTMLButtonTrue",componentId:"sc-1j8rksn-1"})(["color:white;margin:0 6px;background-color:#e85412;"]);export var HTMLTextArea=styled(TextArea).withConfig({displayName:"form__HTMLTextArea",componentId:"sc-1j8rksn-2"})(["border:0;padding:10px 16px;width:100%;min-width:220px;max-width:220px;box-shadow:none;min-height:75px;font-size:14px;line-height:17px;&:focus,&:hover{border:0 !important;box-shadow:none !important;}"]);export var HTMLSelect=styled(Select).withConfig({displayName:"form__HTMLSelect",componentId:"sc-1j8rksn-3"})(["> div{border:0 !important;box-shadow:none !important;&:focus,&:hover{box-shadow:none !important;}}"]);export var HTMLInput=styled(Input).withConfig({displayName:"form__HTMLInput",componentId:"sc-1j8rksn-4"})(["> div{border:0;box-shadow:none;&:focus,&:hover{box-shadow:none;}}input[disabled]{background-color:#f3f3f3;}"]);export var HTMLAutocomplete=styled(Autocomplete).withConfig({displayName:"form__HTMLAutocomplete",componentId:"sc-1j8rksn-5"})(["border:0;"]);
